snippet: Mike and Ike, the brand of chewy fruit-flavored candies, is planning to separate its two mascots, and hoping the development captures the interest of younger consumers.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column notes that new campaign for Mike and Ike chewy fruit-flavored candies, whose parent company is Just Born, has invented a dispute between the fictional characters in hopes of capturing the interest of younger consumers.
lead_paragraph: Mike and Ike, the brand of chewy fruit-flavored candies, is planning to separate its two mascots, and hoping the development captures the interest of younger consumers.

headline.seo: Reviving Mike and Ike by Tearing Them Apart
headline.main: Reviving Two Characters by Tearing Them Apart
headline.print_headline: Reviving 2 Characters By Tearing Them Apart
